tagManagement.title: Tag Management
tagManagement.noTagsDescription: Start using tags in your medical records to see them here.

editModal.title: Edit Tag
editModal.label: Tag Name
editModal.description: This will rename the tag across all {{count}} records.

deleteModal.title: Delete Tag
deleteModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete the tag "{{tag}}"?
deleteModal.description: This will remove the tag from all {{count}} records. This action cannot be undone.

replaceModal.title: Replace Tag
replaceModal.label: Replace With
replaceModal.description: This will replace "{{oldTag}}" with "{{newTag}}" across all {{count}} records.

configuration.title: Report Configuration
configuration.description: Select medical records to include in your custom report

noData.title: No Medical Data Available
noData.description: Add some medical records first to use the report builder.

includeProfilePicture.label: Include Profile Picture
includeProfilePicture.description: Add patient photo to the report header

exportPage.title: Export Health Records
exportPage.description: Download your medical data in various formats for backup or sharing with healthcare providers

exportMode.title: Export Mode
exportMode.singleDescription: Export a single data type in your chosen format
exportMode.bulkDescription: Export multiple data types together in a ZIP file

bulkSelection.label: Select Data Types for Bulk Export

includePatientInfo.label: Include patient information (name, demographics, etc.)
includePatientInfo.description: Uncheck to exclude personal patient details for privacy

json.title: JSON Format:
json.description: Machine-readable structured data format, ideal for importing into other systems or applications.

csv.title: CSV Format:
csv.description: Comma-separated values suitable for spreadsheet applications like Excel or Google Sheets.

pdf.title: PDF Format:
pdf.description: Human-readable document format perfect for printing or sharing with healthcare providers.

bulk.title: Bulk Export:
bulk.description: Creates a ZIP file containing multiple data types in your chosen format for comprehensive data backup.

fileAttachments.title: File Attachments:
fileAttachments.description: When available for PDF exports, lab result files can be included in a ZIP archive.

errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please refresh the page or log in again to access export features.
errors.noActivePatient: No patient profile is currently selected. Please select a patient from the dashboard to use the export feature.
errors.noDataType: Please select at least one data type for bulk export
errors.invalidSettings: Please check your export settings. Make sure you have selected a valid data type and format.
errors.noDataFound: No data found for the selected export criteria. Try selecting a different data type or date range.
errors.bulkInvalidSettings: Please check your bulk export settings. Make sure you have selected at least one data type and a valid format.
errors.bulkNoDataFound: No data found for the selected export criteria. Try selecting different data types or adjusting the date range.

success.exportComplete: Export completed successfully! Your {{format}} file has been downloaded.
success.bulkExportComplete: Bulk export completed successfully! Your ZIP file containing {{count}} data types has been downloaded.

labResults.title: Lab Results
labResults.quickFormInstructions: Enter a name for this lab result, then you'll be able to upload and parse your PDF.
labResults.testNameDescription: This is the only required field - you can add more details later
labResults.testNameTooShort: Test name must be at least {{minLength}} characters
labResults.patientIdRequired: Patient ID is required. Please select a patient first.
labResults.createFailedTryAgain: Failed to create lab result. Please try again.
labResults.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
labResults.timeoutError: Request timed out. Please try again.
labResults.labResultCreated: Lab result "{{testName}}" has been created. Now you can upload and parse your PDF.
labResults.quickImportSuccess: Lab result and test components imported successfully
labResults.unsavedDataMessage: You have {{count}} parsed test component(s) that haven't been added yet. If you close now, you'll lose this parsed data.
labResults.unsavedDataInstructions: Click "Add Components" in the Preview tab to save your parsed data before closing.
labResults.emptyLabResultMessage: You created a lab result but didn't add any test components. Would you like to delete this lab result?
labResults.loadingHint: If this takes too long, please reload the page
labResults.tryAdjustingFilters: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria.
labResults.startAdding: Start adding your first lab result.

testComponents.title: Test Components
testComponents.noComponentsDescription: This lab result doesn't have any individual test components yet.

emptyState.description: Templates provide common lab panels (CBC, CMP, etc.) where you can enter values and ranges. Bulk import allows you to copy/paste results from lab reports for automatic parsing.

placeholders.notes: Additional notes about this test result

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your application preferences and settings

password.title: Password
password.description: Change your account password to keep your account secure
password.passwordHelp: At least 6 characters, must include a letter and a number.

forceChange.title: Password Change Required
forceChange.subtitle: Your account requires a password change before you can continue. Please set a new password below.

errors.passwordTooShort: New password must be at least 6 characters.
errors.passwordMustDiffer: New password must be different from your current password.
errors.passwordComplexity: New password must contain at least one letter and one number.
errors.changeFailed: Failed to change password. Please try again.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: Permanently delete your account and all associated medical data. This action cannot be undone.

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: Browse the wiki for guides, setup instructions, and feature documentation.

issues.title: Report an Issue
issues.description: Found a bug or have a feature request? Open an issue on GitHub.

sponsor.description: MediKeep is free and open source. If you find it useful, consider sponsoring the project to help fund development and keep it going.

unitSystem.title: Unit System
unitSystem.description: Choose whether to display measurements in Imperial (pounds, feet, °F) or Metric (kilograms, centimeters, °C) units

dateFormat.title: Date Format
dateFormat.description: Choose how dates are displayed throughout the application

sessionTimeout.title: Session Timeout
sessionTimeout.description: Set the duration of inactivity before your session expires (in minutes)

documents.description: Configure how your medical documents are stored and managed

cleanup.title: File Cleanup
cleanup.description: Clean up out-of-sync files and resolve document storage inconsistencies. This will reset failed uploads, clear orphaned tasks, and fix database sync issues.

patientInfo.title: Patient Information

welcome.title: Welcome to MediKeep!
welcome.message: Your account has been successfully created. Please complete your patient profile below to start managing your medical records.

patientInfo.createPrompt: Please create your patient profile to get started.
